meanings.definition: The membrane stretched over the open ends of a drum.
meanings.sent1: The drumheads vibrated with each beat of the drum.
meanings.sent2: He carefully replaced the worn drumheads on his drum set.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel mistook the drumheads for acorns and tried to bury them.
meanings.sent4: The drumheads echoed the rhythm of the forest, calling all creatures to dance.
meanings.sent5: The bright red color of the drumheads stood out against the dark stage.

meanings.definition: The top part of a drum.
meanings.sent1: The drummer tapped the drumheads lightly to adjust the sound.
meanings.sent2: The marching band's drum major proudly led the group, twirling his baton above the drumheads.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat climbed to the top of the drumheads and refused to come down.
meanings.sent4: The drumheads gleamed under the stage lights, drawing all eyes to the center.
meanings.sent5: The drummer's hands moved swiftly over the drumheads, creating a mesmerizing rhythm.

meanings.definition: The material covering the top of a drum.
meanings.sent1: The drumheads were made of a special synthetic material for durability.
meanings.sent2: The drummer carefully cleaned the dust off the drumheads before the performance.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous puppy chewed on the drumheads, thinking they were toys.
meanings.sent4: The drumheads shimmered in the sunlight, reflecting the surrounding colors.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the drumsticks hitting the drumheads filled the room with energy.
